H0.text: Who directed the 1941 film ‘The Maltese Falcon’. Orson Welles

H1.text: Who directed the 1941 film ‘The Maltese Falcon’. Billy Wilder

H2.text: Who directed the 1941 film ‘The Maltese Falcon’. Fritz Lang

H3.text: Who directed the 1941 film ‘The Maltese Falcon’. John Huston

A4.text: The Maltese Falcon is a 1941 American film noir written and directed by John Huston in his directorial debut.

A5.text: John Huston's direction of his own screenplay is as brilliant as any of the jewels which are alleged to encrust the falcon whose possession is the crux of the story.
